Segment.name: SPK
Segment.comment: To identify and describe laboratory specimen kit information and handling requirements

Field.name: SpecimenKitTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the specimen kit type or contents used for collecting and forwarding samples used in the tests being reported

Field.name: TransportationMethodTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SPK04 or SPK05 is present, then the other is required.
